response.title: Fiat Chrysler Is Moving a Plant From Mexico to Michigan
India returns PSLV to service with launch of Cartosat-2F
response.description: Nearly four and a half months after their last launch ended in failure, the Indian Space Research Organization (ISRO) successfully delivered the Cartosat-2F Earth-observation satellite to on Flight PSLV-C40.

response.title: Walmart Wages, NSA Spying, Dropbox IPO: CEO Daily for January 12, 2018
GM moves to deploy driverless car fleet in 2019
response.description: General Motors seeks federal approval to launch a fleet of cars without steering wheels or gas pedals in yet-to-be-named city.

response.title: South Korea is talking down the idea a cryptocurrency trading ban is imminent
response.description: South Korea's finance minister reportedly said more coordination is needed among ministries over a possible plan to ban cryptocurrency trading.
